description:
This course covers six areas of risk management in PMBOK® 5th edition and has 70 multiple choice practice questions!

Plan Risk Management

Identify Risks

Perform Qualitative Risk analysis

Perform Quantitative Risk Analysis

Plan Risk Response

Control Risks

This course is essential for anyone planning to write the PMP® exam regardless of any other course you take. It provides incredible value and contains scenario-based questions which are essential in order to understand the material on risk management.
title: PMP® Exam Prep: Risk Management
